# OTZ Group

> AI transformation for small and medium businesses in South Florida

## About

OTZ Group is an AI consulting firm based in Miami, Florida, specializing in practical AI implementation for SMBs across healthcare, retail, and logistics. We make enterprise-grade AI accessible to growing businesses through rapid deployment and measurable ROI.

## Services

- AI Strategy Consulting: Assessment, roadmap development, and implementation planning
- AI Implementation: Custom AI solutions deployed in 21-day sprints
- Voice Agents: Intelligent phone systems for appointment booking, customer service, and lead qualification
- Nucleus Platform: Proprietary unified business data infrastructure for AI-ready operations
- Process Automation: Workflow optimization using multi-agent systems
- CRM Integration: AI-enhanced customer relationship management

## Industries Served

- Healthcare (dental practices, clinics, medical offices)
- Retail and E-commerce
- Logistics and Operations
- Hospitality

## Location

Miami, Florida, USA
Serving South Florida SMBs

## Contact

Website: https://otz.group

## Differentiators

- 21-day implementation sprints
- Performance-based pricing models
- Deployed teams approach for ongoing support
- Proprietary Nucleus data infrastructure platform
- Focus on measurable ROI and revenue impact
